A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really liked this as a movie\, but also as a star wars story. There are some flaws\, but they didn't distract me much or hurt my enjoyment of the movie. I loved some of the main story arcs. I would have liked some more fleshed out character development of some. But ultimately it was super good and I think  the final resolution to this film gets down to what it is to be a Jedi.  FIGHT ME IRL!
